tool_description: Creates a complete formatted bibliography from multiple citations, applying consistent formatting and proper ordering.

citation_style.description: Bibliography style: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver

hanging_indent.description: Whether to apply hanging indent formatting

error_messages: Empty citation list: Provide at least one citation to generate bibliography.
Too many citations: Maximum 500 citations allowed per bibliography.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver].
Invalid sort order: Use one of [alphabetical, chronological, appearance_order].
usage: Provide an array of formatted citations and specify citation_style. Optionally configure sort_order, include_title, and hanging_indent for formatting preferences.

formatted_bibliography.description: Complete formatted bibliography with all citations

citation_count.description: Number of citations included in bibliography
